title: Luxkeeper的艺术作品页
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:bhl-dark-sidebar]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:collapsible-sidebar]]


[[module css]]
/*----HEADER AND LOGO----*/
div#container-wrap {
    background: url(http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/luxkeeper/Lux-HeadBg) top left repeat-x;
}
div#header {
    background: url(http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/luxkeeper/Lux-logoV3.gif) 0px 0px no-repeat;
}
div#header h1 a span {
    font-size: 0px;
}

div#header h1 a:before {
    content: "要有光";
    color: rgb(255, 255, 125);
}
div#header h2 span {
    font-size:0px;
    padding: 4px;
}
div#header h2:after {
    content: "烁明、璀璨、丕耀";
    font-weight: bold;
    color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
    padding: 115px;
    text-shadow: #ffff6f 1px 0 10px;
    white-space: pre;
}

/* ----MODULE RATE---- */
div.page-rate-widget-box,
div.page-rate-widget-box span.rate-points,
div.page-rate-widget-box span.cancel {
    background-color: rgb(255, 255, 126)!important;
    border: ridge rgb(255, 255, 126) 1px!important;
}
div.page-rate-widget-box span.rateup,
div.page-rate-widget-box span.ratedown {
    border: ridge rgb(255, 255, 126)!important;
    border-width: 1px 0!important;
}
div.page-rate-widget-box span.rate-points,
div.page-rate-widget-box span.cancel a,
div.page-rate-widget-box span.cancel a:hover {
    color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
}
div.page-rate-widget-box span.rateup,
div.page-rate-widget-box span.ratedown {
    background-color: rgb(255, 255, 126)!important;
}
div.page-rate-widget-box span.rateup a,
div.page-rate-widget-box span.ratedown a {
    color: rgb(255, 255, 255)!important;
}
div.page-rate-widget-box span.cancel a:hover,
div.page-rate-widget-box span.rateup a:hover,
div.page-rate-widget-box span.ratedown a:hover {
    background: transparent!important;
    color: transparent!important;
}

/* ----LUX LOGO BACKGROUND---- */
.orderwrapper {
position: relative;
width: auto;
text-align: center;
}
.council1 {
position: relative;
top: 0;
bottom: 0;
left: 0;
right: 0;
width: 295px;
height: 295px;
margin: auto;
background-image: url( "http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/luxkeeper/Lux-Head" );
background-size: 295px 295px;
background-repeat: no-repeat;
background-position: center;
}

/*----HEAD FONT----*/
h1,h2,h4,h5,h6 {
    color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
    text-shadow: #ffff6f 1px 0 10px;
}

/*----BODY & BODY FONT---*/
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Architects+Daughter&display=swap');
.page {
    display: block;
    overflow: hidden;
    font-family: 'Architects Daughter', cursive;
    font-style: normal;

    background-attachment: scroll;
    background-clip: border-box;
    background-color: transparent;
    background-image: linear-gradient(to top ,rgb(92, 176, 232) 0%, rgb(255, 248, 228) 8%);
    background-origin: padding-box;
    background-position: 0px 8px;
    background-repeat: repeat;
    background-size: 100% 20px;

    border: 1px solid #CCC;
    border-radius: 5px;
    padding: 5px 5px;
    margin-bottom: 5px;

    box-shadow: 0px 1px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)
    }
.page p {
    line-height: 20px;
    margin: 0;
    font-size: 150%
}

/*----BACKGROUND GRADIENT----*/
.bg-gradiant{
     margin: 0em;
     padding: 0em;

background:
     linear-gradient(to bottom,
            hsl(0, 100%, 100%),
            hsl(0, 100%, 20%),
            hsl(0, 100%, 0%),
            hsl(0, 100%, 0%));
}

/* ----INFO BAR---- */

 body{ --barColour: hsl(60, 100%, 75%); }
 .info-container .collapsible-block-unfolded{ background: hsl(0, 0%, 100%); }
 #u-author_block{ display: none; }

/* ---- TABS ---- */
div.yui-navset div.yui-content {
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
    border: 2px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
}
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav a,
div.yui-navset div.yui-navset-top ul.yui-nav a {
    background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
}
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav a:hover,
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav a:focus {
    background: rgb(152, 0, 0);
    color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
}
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav .selected a,
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav .selected a:focus,
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav .selected a:hover {
    background: rgb(0, 0, 0);
    color: rgb(152, 0, 0);
    text-shadow: #ffff6f 1px 0 10px;
}

[[/module]]

[[div class="bg-gradiant"]]

[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:info-ayers
|authorPage=luxkeeper-s-artpage
|comments=**Luxkeeper的艺术作品页** 由[[*user Luxkeeper*]]制作@@ @@
@@@@
特别感谢[[*user AnAnomalousWriter*]]@@ @@
对我在动态图标上的帮助，来看看他自己的[[[ananomalouswriter-s-wallpaper-place-and-more 艺术作品页]]]@@ @@
@@@@
有请求？可以随意向我[[*user Luxkeeper*]]发送维基私信@@ @@
或者你还可以来看看或是在我的[https://www.deviantart.com/lightsonofsun deviant艺术作品页]上私信我@@ @@
]]

[[div style="background: maroon; padding: 1px 15px; border: ridge 5px gold; margin: 10px; border-radius: 30px 15px;"]]

[[div style="background: black; padding: 1px 15px; border: inset 3px gold; margin: 10px; border-radius: 30px 15px;"]]

[[div class="orderwrapper"]]
[[div class="council1"]]
[[=]]

+  欢迎来到我的艺术作品页面 👻
@@@@

++++++ - 壁纸
++++++ - 可能是动图？
[[/==]]

[[/div]]
